results.title: Michael Jordan Playoff Stats - StatMuse
results.content: Michael Jordan averaged 33.4 points, 6.4 rebounds and 5.7 assists in 179 games in the playoffs in his career.

results.raw_content:
Michael Jordan's World

Stats, records, achievements, shoes and more

Michael Jordan Finals Stats

Michael Jordan's numbers in the NBA Finals

Michael Jordan played six NBA Finals in his 15-year career. And he won them all...

His 41.0 points per game in 1993 are still an NBA  record.

Here you have his stats in the  Finals.

results.content: Michael Jordan Playoff Series - Full Stats ... Show Stats: by Year (Basic) / by Year (Full) / by Points / by Rebounds / by Assists / by Steals / by Blocks. Michael Jordan played in 179 games in 13 Playoffs. That includes 37 Playoff series. His team won 30 of those series and lost 7. ... Finals: vs. Trail Blazers: W. 4-2. 6: 42.3: 35.8: 1.0: 3.8
